channel.title: When i go to run my Client
channel.description: My client goes to a white screen and says " Java error , click for details " I click it, and it says " class not found exception, client.class " Any ideas..? Removed my java, downlaoded it.. Plug-ins are fine.

item.title: When i go to run my Client
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

When using the java command, you can’t include the “.class” in the name. At that point, it takes everything before the ‘.’ (if one exists) and assigns that as the package, and looks for it there.

Simply removing the “.class” should fix it.

Read full topic
item.source: When i go to run my Client

I click it, and it says " class not found exception, client.class "
Any ideas…?
Removed my java, downlaoded it… Plug-ins are fine.
